title: Celebrating on a Budget
itunes:title: Celebrating on a Budget
description:
Do you ball on a budget? Well today on the show we opened the phone lines to see how much our listeners are willing to pay at a wedding, after a recent story came out about a couple making their guest pay for their food and drinks at their wedding. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to two men who allegedly hands officers papers with bag of presumed meth during a traffic stop, and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
